job_history.work_description: Work one-on-one with a morning child and an afternoon child. Was trained on multiple different children to sub in or to help out at anytime. Followed and implemented all behavior/treatment plans and guidelines. Maintained daily and detailed records of child's individual activities, targets, behaviors, meals and other activities. Supervised/engaged in outing (field trips) that my child attended. Helped child reach milestone in self-care, educational and social areas. Developed professional relationships with parents/families, teachers/other therapists, directors/program managers. Collaborated monthly with Program managers about child's progress and new ideas to possibly implement for more growth.
Keep watch for any safety infractions. Answer any needs/questions that patrons have. Provide a fun and safe environment for patrons to workout in.

skills.name: Child Development
skills.explanation: Worked one-on-one with children, implemented behavior/treatment plans, and maintained detailed records, indicating strong proficiency in child development.

skills.name: Behavioral Therapy
skills.explanation: Trained on multiple children, implemented treatment plans, and helped children reach milestones, suggesting strong proficiency in behavioral therapy.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Developed professional relationships with parents, teachers, and other therapists, and collaborated with program managers, showing solid working proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Managed daily activities, maintained records, and supervised outings, indicating solid working proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Safety and Risk Management
skills.explanation: Kept watch for safety infractions as a fitness consultant, showing some practical experience in safety and risk management.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Provided a fun and safe environment for patrons, answered questions, and addressed needs, indicating some practical experience in customer service.

skills.name: Psychology
skills.explanation: Completed a Bachelor of Science in Psychology, but no direct work experience is mentioned, indicating basic familiarity with the subject.
